_header: Above all thing thou art a king
_description: A song on Money — twenty quatrains (abcb) and 4-line burden: ‘Money money now hay goode day / Money where haste thow be / Money money thow goste away / & wylt not byde wyth me’

BLRoy17Bxlvii.First Lines:
Aboue all th[i]ng thow arte a kyngAnd rulyst the world ouer
                    all…
BLRoy17Bxlvii.Last Lines:
…Yt ys allwayes sene nowadayesThat money makythe the
                    man
